about_the_game:
Get ready to embark on an electrifying adventure with Robin and Curio!
This action-packed game is set in a retro-futuristic world where danger and excitement lurk around every corner.

Join Robin, a creative and resourceful kid with Dyslexia, as she wakes up as Curio, a smart prototype toy, in a world where human souls have been transferred into their favorite toys. Together, you'll journey through this vibrant landscape on a mission to collect the DynoPorter machine parts needed to transfer human souls back to their bodies and save the world from pollution.

But the challenges you'll face won't be easy. You'll need to manage Curio's energy efficiently, build and use tools and attachments to solve puzzles, and outsmart your enemies. With Robin's maker-ship nature and your sense of adventure, you'll be able to repurpose other toy parts to your advantage, control other toys, find clever solutions to seemingly simple tasks, and trick or disable enemies.

Don't miss out on this thrilling adventure with Robin and Curio. The fate of humanity rests in your hands, so get ready to face the challenge head-on and emerge victorious.

About the Game

[b]Get ready to embark on an electrifying adventure with Robin and Curio![/b] This action-packed game is set in a retro-futuristic world where danger and excitement lurk around every corner. Join Robin, a creative and resourceful kid with Dyslexia, as she wakes up as Curio, a smart prototype toy, in a world where human souls have been transferred into their favorite toys. Together, you'll journey through this vibrant landscape on a mission to collect the DynoPorter machine parts needed to transfer human souls back to their bodies and save the world from pollution. But the challenges you'll face won't be easy. You'll need to manage Curio's energy efficiently, build and use tools and attachments to solve puzzles, and outsmart your enemies. With Robin's maker-ship nature and your sense of adventure, you'll be able to repurpose other toy parts to your advantage, control other toys, find clever solutions to seemingly simple tasks, and trick or disable enemies. Don't miss out on this thrilling adventure with Robin and Curio. The fate of humanity rests in your hands, so get ready to face the challenge head-on and emerge victorious


About the Game

Get ready to embark on an electrifying adventure with Robin and Curio!
This action-packed game is set in a retro-futuristic world where danger and excitement lurk around every corner.

Join Robin, a creative and resourceful kid with Dyslexia, as she wakes up as Curio, a smart prototype toy, in a world where human souls have been transferred into their favorite toys. Together, you'll journey through this vibrant landscape on a mission to collect the DynoPorter machine parts needed to transfer human souls back to their bodies and save the world from pollution.

But the challenges you'll face won't be easy. You'll need to manage Curio's energy efficiently, build and use tools and attachments to solve puzzles, and outsmart your enemies. With Robin's maker-ship nature and your sense of adventure, you'll be able to repurpose other toy parts to your advantage, control other toys, find clever solutions to seemingly simple tasks, and trick or disable enemies.

Don't miss out on this thrilling adventure with Robin and Curio. The fate of humanity rests in your hands, so get ready to face the challenge head-on and emerge victorious.

short_description: In a world where humans’ souls were transferred into toys, plug into Curio and join Robin, a creative Dyslexic kid, on an electric adventure through her memories & the Solar City. Head into an action-puzzle platformer, where you will be tackled by crazy challenges & overcome the SteamPunk Gang.
